attributes.action: Cancel the Prime Minister's pension plan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Fred Goodwin is under pressure from the Prime Minister to revoke his pension plan. This is due to his failure in running Royal Bank of Scotland prudently. This petition aims to apply some consistency to Gordon Brown's rhetoric, and seeks to revoke his pension plan, due to his abject failure in controlling the UK economy over his period as Chancellor and Prime Minister. There will be no reward for failure.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
